listitem.para: Changed the MetaSQL parser to use the Standard C++ library instead of Qt
Added a warning when the user tries to import MetaSQL statements with importmql_gui but has not selected any items
Improved the handling of layout items and the sections they are in
Fixed Mac-specific overlap problem with right-aligned text areas
Fixed section repositioning code not to take space for hidden headers and footers
Fixed report_date and report_time Context Query values
Fixed problems with MetaSQL parameters including '-' and '_' in the parameter name
Fixed parsing problems when MetaSQL statements have single quotes inside comments
Fixed problems importing MetaSQL statements containing backslashes when the PostgreSQL database server has standard_conforming_strings set to true
Fixed problem opening Print Preview dialog from modal windows
